text: Simão Sessim (8 December 1935 - 16 August 2021) was a Brazilian politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Progressistas Party. In 1979, he was elected to the Chamber of Deputies. He retired in 2019. Sessim was born in Rio de Janeiro. From 1973 until 1977, he was the Mayor of Nilópolis. Sessim died on 16 August 2021 in Rio de Janeiro from COVID-19, aged 85.Morre o ex-deputado federal Simão Sessim, em decorrência da Covid-19 ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Rio de Janeiro
title: Simão Sessim
